title: BACK FROM VACATION and Bobby Got MARRIED! Bobby Reveals All The Details: First Dance Song, Unexpected Drama and The Show’s Favorite Moments + Recap of Our Vacations
itunes:title: BACK FROM VACATION and Bobby Got MARRIED! Bobby Reveals All The Details: First Dance Song, Unexpected Drama and The Show’s Favorite Moments + Recap of Our Vacations
description:
We are back in the studio after a 2-week break and excited to share with you all the stories from vacation. Bobby got MARRIED! He reveals why he decided to keep it a secret, what his first dance song was and a piece of unexpected drama that went down. We all recap our headlines from our vacation to get you caught up on what’s been going on!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
